notice.ch: 密碼卡僅發給高級組僑生，不發給一般生。

remark.ch: 密碼卡僅發給高級組僑生，不發給一般生。

goal.ch: 一、課程目標： 本課程旨在培養學生能恰當使用文字將個人之想法、認知表達出來，以期對於日常人際之應對及升學、職場等，均有所助益。從基礎之文字運用、修辭技巧、結構佈局以及語意邏輯等方面，逐步進展，最後會搭配實例分析及學生習作，訓練學生因應各種場合之需求，具備相對應之基本中文寫作能力。課程根據實際所需，分為六大領域：公文、文學、企畫、新聞、論文、自述。 二、內容概述： 公文：所謂的「公文」一般是指「處理公務之文書」，依「公文程式條例」的規定，公文的類別有：令、呈、咨、函、公告及其他六項。本來關於「公文」必須至少有一方為政府機關，但為顧及學生較常使用的需求，所以本單元將「公文」重新界定為「公共文書」的意思，依此將本單元的內容稍做修訂，以「函」、「請柬」、「書信」及「啟事」四類為其主要內容。 文學：在以應用為考量的前提之下，文學寫作仍有其存在的必要，文學寫作擁有不拘形式發揮創意的可能，避免能避免寫作機械化格式寫作的陷阱。本部分課程希望能透過對於各種情境的掌握，語感的掌握，養成同學自我思考與訓練的習慣。 企畫：分為一般企劃及學術企劃（以讀書計畫為例），並包含製作簡報。確切掌握一般企劃、讀書計畫與簡報的撰寫要點。實際操作一般企劃、讀書計畫與簡報的寫作練習。透過撰寫一般企劃、讀書計畫與簡報，訓練學生蒐集資料、觀察構思、自我評估、語文表達的能力。 新聞：新聞寫作通常語意清楚，語法正確，以便快速傳遞新知，有效分享資訊，成功製造議題。本課程目的，即引導學生掌握新聞寫作的基礎知識後，累積寫作經驗，養成更明白流暢的語言表達能力。同時能培養其對國家、社會各議題均有客觀而正確的認知，對各階層人物也都能肯定、包容與尊重。 論文：讓大學生熟悉學術著作之中文寫作要點，並透過習作與案例研討，加強其學術著作之中文表達能力。 自述：謙虛雖是美德，但在現代社會，無論求學或謀識，甚至一般社會活動中，仍需要適度讓他人知曉自己的長處。「自述」的內容，自然是作者最熟悉的自己，然而正因為掌握了巨細靡遺的資料，反而往往不知從何下筆。再者，此類文書往往都因「有求於人」而作，因此，既標榜自己的優點，又不至於狂妄自大，才能發揮此類文書的效用。
goal.en: 1. curriculum objectives: this course aims to train students to express their personal thoughts and cognition in proper use of words, so as to help them cope with daily interpersonal relationships, go to school and work. From the basic use of words, rhetorical skills, structural layout and semantic logic, we will make progress step by step. Finally, we will train students to meet the needs of various occasions and have the corresponding basic Chinese writing ability. According to the actual needs, the course is divided into six areas: official documents, literature, planning, news, papers and self-reports. II. Summary of contents: Official documents: The so-called "official documents" generally refer to "documents for handling official duties". According to the regulations of the Official Document Procedure Ordinance, official documents are classified into six categories: orders, presentations, consultations, letters, announcements and others. Originally, at least one party of "official document" must be a government agency. However, in order to meet the needs of students' more frequent use, this unit redefined "official document" as "public document". Based on this, the contents of this unit were slightly revised, with "letter", "invitation", "letter" and "notice" as its main contents. Literature: On the premise of considering application, literary writing still has its necessity, and literary writing has the possibility of exerting creativity in any form, so as to avoid the trap of mechanized format writing. This part of the course hopes to cultivate students' habit of self-thinking and training by mastering various situations and language sense. Planning: It is divided into general planning and academic planning (taking the reading plan as an example), and includes making presentations. Accurately grasp the writing points of general planning, reading plan and presentation. Practical writing exercises of general planning, reading plan and presentation. Train students' ability to collect data, observe ideas, evaluate themselves and express in Chinese by writing general plans, reading plans and presentations. News: News writing usually has clear semantics and correct grammar, so as to quickly convey new knowledge, effectively share information and successfully create issues. The purpose of this course is to guide students to master the basic knowledge of news writing, accumulate writing experience and develop a better understanding and fluent language expression ability. At the same time, it can cultivate students' objective and correct cognition on various issues of the country and society, and can affirm, tolerate and respect people from all walks of life. Thesis: Make college students familiar with the main points of Chinese writing of academic works, and strengthen their Chinese expression ability of academic works through assignments and case studies. Self-report: Modesty is a virtue, but in modern society, it is still necessary to let others know their own strengths appropriately, whether in studying or seeking knowledge, or even in general social activities. The content of "self-report" is naturally the author's most familiar self. However, because he has mastered the detailed information, he often doesn't know where to write. Moreover, such instruments are often made for "wanting from others". Therefore, only by flaunting one's own advantages and not being arrogant can the effectiveness of such instruments be brought into full play.

outline.ch:
第一單元：公文
1. 函：在各類處理公務之文書中，「函」是最常使用的一種公文類別。本課程希望透過對「函」的介紹，使學生能對「函」的使用方式、書寫格式、用語都能有基本的認識。
2. 請柬：使學生了解日常生活中的請柬種類與內容，以及適切的使用時機與範圍。同時在面對各種人際關係的應對進退時，能合宜且正確的進行請柬寫作。
3. 書信：能對書信（包括電子郵件、傳統信件，以及邀請函）的定位，以及寫作態度、禮儀有恰當的理解。並且對於書信格式與內容的寫作要點、注意事項，有一定程度的掌握。藉由釐清撰寫書信的目的，與所欲達成的效果，培養文字表達的能力，以及提綱挈領、組織條理的思考能力。
4. 啟事：瞭解「啟事」的意義、結構、體例和法律效力；並經由觀摩和練習，以熟悉「啟事」的作法
第二單元：文學
1. 散文：鼓勵同學掌握題材，挖掘深度，發揮創意。寓言寫作發掘生活中的小故事大道理，並利用寓言的概念，培養學生夾敘夾議的寫作方式。看圖寫作則藉學生所準備的圖畫或照片喚起腦海中的記憶片段，培養學生的觀察能力，並引導學生具體而微地描述畫面中所呈現的人、時、事、地、物，以及思想感情。
2. 劇本：從經典介紹，逐步分析，引領同學設身處地的認識場景，設想劇中人物，構思恰如其份的語言，對於日後待人接物，會有處類旁通的效用。
第三單元：企畫
1. 一般企畫：了解企畫的意義與生活中的應用範圍。掌握企畫書的基本架構與寫作要點，並練習寫作完整的企畫書。藉由寫作企畫書，培養學生觀察構思、蒐集資料、整理評估、組織表達等能力。
2. 簡報寫作：能確切掌握簡報應該具備的內容。明白製作簡報的方式。知道如何蒐集資料。提昇邏輯思辨的能力。養成穩健的台風以及口語達的能力。對自己建立起足夠的自信心。
第四單元：新聞
1. 新聞稿：針對各類新聞事件，透過人物採訪、相關法令及資料之查詢，清楚瞭解其前因後果，並分析可能對社會造成之影響，撰寫一篇立場客觀、用辭精確、條理清晰之新聞稿，訓練其對事件的觀察力與判斷力。
2. 社論：針對公共議題，從考量不同層面的角度、立場，綜合從過去到當下對此議題的種種看法，而後提出個人之觀點。態度上盡量力求客觀、公允而不偏頗，用辭上不過於激烈、具傷害性，能以理服人而非流於不理性的謾罵，培養公民素質及對事件深入分析之能力。
3. 人物專訪：針對專訪人物之屬性，先擬定適合之問題，引導被採訪人有條理的論述其人生經驗、個人思想、處事態度等，而後歸結出能夠提供給他人啟發、學習、參考的特點。訪問時雖要盡量完整呈現被訪問人之人生，但仍須尊重他人之隱私，採取恰當之語詞，不可過於咄咄逼人。在訪問過程，瞭解尊重他人的重要性，訓練與人交談之技巧與態度。
4. 深度報導：結合新聞稿與社論的特性，針對某一事件或議題，並與其他相關事件、議題結合，從不同角度、立場進行探索，且能連貫過去的成因沿革、現今狀況及對未來之可能影響，進行全面性且深入的報導，以期完整呈現此一議題或事件之各個面向及影響。藉此訓練思維的多面性、深刻度與邏輯性。
5. 新聞改編：先針對既有之新聞事件或議題有深入且完整的認知之後，根據此新聞事件進行改編，改編後之事件需與原事件有所關連，且需具合理性，訓練學生之觀察力、理解力、想像力與邏輯性。
第五單元：論文
本單元為論文寫作導引，講授習作課程以以下三項為主，並針對論文寫作過程中一些重要關鍵進行解說與練習：
1. 論文摘要：指導學生在閱讀學術論文時，將文章重點以摘要寫作的形式呈現，以掌握論文要義。
2. 讀書計畫：熟悉未來讀書計畫撰寫要點，並由實際操作練習，完成一篇翔實的讀書計畫，以利日後繼續升學或是申請獎學金使用。
3. 研究計畫：認識研究計畫書寫要點，培養整理及分析資料之能力，並藉由研究計畫書寫之訓練，培養思考及解決問題的能力。
第六單元：自述
4. 自傳：內容包含以下四項：家庭背景、求學經歷、個人經歷、未來展望。自傳的文字力求真切誠懇，內容以平實為要。自傳的內容必須呈現個人特質、專業能力及生涯規劃，藉此顯現不同階段的成長、思維與經歷。
outline.en:
Unit 1: Official Documents
1. Letter: "Letter" is the most commonly used official document category among all kinds of official documents. This course hopes that through the introduction of "letter", students can have a basic understanding of the usage, writing format and language of "letter".
2. Invitations: to enable students to understand the types and contents of invitations in daily life, as well as the appropriate use time and scope. At the same time, in the face of various interpersonal relationships, we can write invitations appropriately and correctly.
3. Letters: Have a proper understanding of the positioning of letters (including e-mail, traditional letters and invitations), writing attitude and etiquette. And for the letter format and content of the writing points, matters needing attention, have a certain degree of mastery. By clarifying the purpose of writing letters and the desired effect, we can cultivate the ability of writing and the ability to think in a concise and organized way.
4. Notice: Understand the meaning, structure, style and legal effect of "notice"; And through observation and practice, to be familiar with the practice of "notice"
Unit 2: Literature
1. Prose: Encourage students to master the subject matter, explore the depth and develop creativity. Fable writing explores the truth of small stories in life, and uses the concept of fable to cultivate students' writing style with narration and discussion. Picture writing evokes memory fragments in the mind through pictures or photos prepared by students, cultivates students' observation ability, and guides students to describe people, time, things, places, things, thoughts and feelings in the picture concretely and slightly.
2. Script: Through introduction from classics and step-by-step analysis, it will lead students to put themselves in the scene, imagine the characters in the play, and conceive appropriate language, which will have the effect of bypassing others in the future.
Unit 3: Planning
1. General planning: Understand the meaning of planning and its application in life. Master the basic structure and writing points of the plan, and practice writing a complete plan. By writing a plan, students can be trained in observing ideas, collecting data, sorting out and evaluating, organizing and expressing, etc.
2. Briefing writing: Be able to grasp exactly what a briefing should have. Understand how to make presentations. Know how to collect data. Improve the ability of logical speculation. Develop a steady typhoon and the ability to speak well. Build up enough confidence in yourself.
Unit 4: News
1. Press release: For all kinds of news events, through interviews with people, inquiries about relevant laws and data, we can clearly understand their causes and consequences, analyze the possible impact on society, and write a press release with objective position, precise wording and clear organization to train their observation and judgment on events.
2. Editorial: Aiming at public issues, considering different perspectives and positions, synthesizing various views on this issue from the past to the present, and then putting forward personal views. Try our best to be objective, fair and unbiased in attitude, use words that are not too fierce and harmful, convince people with reason instead of irrational abuse, and cultivate citizens' quality and ability to analyze events in depth.
3. Interview with people: According to the attributes of the interviewed people, first draw up suitable questions, guide the interviewees to discuss their life experiences, personal thoughts, attitudes, etc. in an orderly way, and then sum up the characteristics that can provide others with inspiration, learning and reference. Although the life of the interviewee should be presented as completely as possible during the visit, it is necessary to respect the privacy of others, adopt appropriate words and not be too aggressive. During the interview, understand the importance of respecting others, and train the skills and attitude of talking with others.
4. In-depth reporting: combining the characteristics of press releases and editorials, aiming at an event or topic, and combining with other related events and topics, exploring from different angles and positions, and being able to make a comprehensive and in-depth report in order to fully present all aspects and influences of this topic or event. In this way, we can train the versatility, depth and logic of thinking.
5. News adaptation: After having a thorough and complete understanding of the existing news events or issues, the adaptation should be based on this news event. The adapted events should be related to the original events, and should be reasonable, so as to train students' observation, understanding, imagination and logic.
Unit 5: Thesis
This unit is the guidance of thesis writing, which mainly teaches the following three courses, and explains and exercises some important keys in the process of thesis writing:
1. Abstract: to guide students to read academic papers, the focus of the article will be presented in the form of abstract writing, in order to grasp the essence of the paper.
2. Reading plan: Get familiar with the main points of writing the future reading plan, and complete a detailed reading plan by practical practice, so as to facilitate further studies or apply for scholarships in the future.
3. Research plan: recognize the key points of writing research plan, cultivate the ability of sorting and analyzing data, and cultivate the ability of thinking and solving problems through the training of writing research plan.
Unit 6: Self-report
4. Autobiography: It contains the following four items: family background, school experience, personal experience and future prospect. Autobiographies strive to be genuine and sincere, and the content is plain. The content of autobiography must show personal characteristics, professional ability and career planning, so as to show the growth, thinking and experience in different stages.

textbook.ch:
《南瓜變馬車：應用文故事指導書》(徐秀菁, 楊雅儒, 陳儀, 李慧琪, 康珮, 黃思超, 五南出版社)
《大學中文寫作》(劉承慧主編,國立清華大學出版社)
《大學中文教程:學院報告寫作》(劉承慧主編,國立清華大學出版社)
《大學國文魔法書》(大學國文教材編輯室編,聯經)

《大學中文寫作》(劉承慧主編,國立清華大學出版社)

隨堂作業：45%

Attendance/class performance: 15%
Reading experience: 15%
Business case competition: 25%
Classroom assignment: 45%
